data.oai_dc:dc: Behavioural data of simultaneous choice tests between two urinary stimuli at the end of the branches of a Y maze. Data are time spent (in seconds) in the neutral part, on each branch, and in contact with each stimulus, recorded in laboratory with the Observer 5.0 software. Information about the tested mice and the stimuli are present, as well as references to the sections of the article referring to each test.
hybrid signal|mate recognition|urinary cues|reproductive character displacement|speciation|mate choice
